The audience is dying to know the answer to a question that only a medium could answer! Are you ready for it? Don't disappoint us, darling!
Would. You. Smooch. A. Ghost?
What's up with the outfit, darling? Did you decide to join in while doing some workouts?

So it's Perona's turn! The audience wants to know how is a day in the life of a ghost queen like? What fascinating tales of royalty and ghost trickery are you hiding?
You may have the biggest hat around, but certainly not the sharpest wits this game, darling!
Bye bye, beautiful! Send my regards to your spirit servants!
Oh my! Looks like even with all that fan support, you still couldn't pull through! Well, you better give them their reward, right?
Your fans have been so patient to see more of you, beautiful! Give them what they deserve!
What's wrong, gorgeous? Knees weak? Arms spaghetti? That doesn't stop true performers in the slightest!
Are the rumors true? Are you really prone to getting wasted and doing all sorts of unspeakable deeds in the streets? Oh my! Now I understand why you're in a place like this!
Looks like you're no match for a true MTT brand representative, darling! But if you wanted to sponsor our products to your countless viewers, I'd be more than glad to reach a marketing agreement!
Dazzle us, Marcie! Show us why you're the vampire queen!
Make it a good one, your majesty! The audience begs for your next strip!

Let's read a message from one of our viewers!
{small}"Dear Marceline, is it true that your armpits stink? And if they do, can I stick up my..."{!reset}
Oh my! That's way too much information, buddy!

Ohh, here's an interesting message from a dedicated viewer!
{small}"Marceline, is that really your true form? And if not, how does it actually look like?"{!reset}
Such an honor to have the one and only Valkyrie on our show! Give us a good strip, Angie!

Who would've known that even with her multiple PhDs, academic achievements and military success, Mercy herself likes to play strip poker with strangers to de-stress? Maybe strip poker isn't as bad as people believe? I'd like to hear your thoughts, viewers!

Oh, here's a question from a member of our staff! This is for Mercy!
{small}"um......hi, ms ziegler...... sorry to bother you while youre having fun...... i wanted to ask if your...resurrection... could work on beings that have been dead for a long time....... sorry for putting you in a bad spot if it doesnt....... oh, im rambling again, sorry..........{!reset}
Time for you to take the spotlight, Angela! Show off those excellent legs of yours! I would know, since mine are engineered to be excellent as well!

Here's a message from one of our viewers at home!
"Dear Mercy, where is your staff? And since you're playing strip poker, could you use it to pole dance?"
Boy, I'll let you answer that one, Angie!
It's Komi's turn to lose clothing in front of countless viewers watching her every move! How are you feeling, gorgeous?
I hope you're not feeling too nervous, 'cause the audience is loving you, Komi! You have to keep it going!
Come on, darling! Let's see your best moves!
It's time for your scene, darling! Show them what you're made of!
Knock 'em dead, darling!

Unlike other game shows, you don't have to prove you're smarter than an 5th grader or fall avoid falling into water pits, so it could always be worse, darling! Enjoy your light punishment!
Sorry, not sorry ~target~! You knew what you were getting into when you agreed to play! Now, it's time to strip!
The scene is set, the spotlight is on, and it's ~target~'s turn to impress!
Well well well! Looks like ~target~ has lost the round! Time for her to lose something else too!

~Target~ loses this round! And we all know what that means, don't we?

Oh, I get the feeling that I know who's this from...

{small}"I JUST WANT TO THANK ~TARGET~ FOR HER BRAVERY! NOT ALL OF US SKINNY BEINGS CAN MAKE IT ON LIVE TV, AND BE PRAISED FOR OUR BODIES! MAYBE I SHOULD JOIN THE STRIPPING CARD GAMES TOO!{!reset}
Oh, dear... Y-you truly are an inspiration, ~target~!

Time for another message from the audience!
{small}"Mettaton, please tell ~target~ that I really admire her body. She should be proud of it! And I'd admire it even more if she stepped on me!"{!reset}
... Well, I just told her! Hope you're happy, random viewer!

{small}"Mettaton, tell ~target~ that she's going in the right direction, but she needs to train more if she wants to compare to us Underground monsters!"{!reset}
That sounds like a challenge! What you say, ~target~?

state.text: Truly, what are the odds of witnessing a tie in poker? One in a million? One in a billion! Those kinds of things only happen here, folks!
Some might think that a tie is boring because nobody gets to strip, but trust me my lucky viewers, most of you will get to brag that nobody saw a tie in poker except you!
The tension! The drama! Like shooting the last sixth bullet of a russian roulette to find out the gun was empty all along!
Well, I guess this is the time for our union-regulated break!
